site.name: 365 The Travel Cafe
site.tagline: Journey Through Flavors, One Cup at a Time
site.description: A unique travel-themed cafe bringing global flavors and experiences to your neighborhood

hero.headline: 365 The Travel Cafe
hero.subtitle: Journey Through Flavors, One Cup at a Time

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.text: The best coffee in town! The atmosphere is cozy and the staff is always friendly. I come here every morning.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.text: Their cold brew is absolutely amazing. The pastries are fresh and delicious. Highly recommend!

testimonials.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonials.text: Perfect place to work and get inspired. The coffee keeps me going and the ambiance is just right.

testimonials.name: David Kim
testimonials.text: I host all my client meetings here. Professional atmosphere with excellent service and coffee.

about.title: Our Journey
about.description: 365 The Travel Cafe was born from a passion for travel and a love for great coffee. We bring you authentic flavors from around the world, creating a unique cafe experience that transports you to different corners of the globe with every sip.

milestones.title: The Adventure Begins
milestones.description: 365 The Travel Cafe opened with a vision to combine travel culture with exceptional coffee experiences.

milestones.title: Global Expansion
milestones.description: We introduced flavors from 30+ countries, making us a destination for travelers and coffee lovers alike.

milestones.title: Community Hub
milestones.description: Became a gathering place for travelers, digital nomads, and adventure seekers sharing stories over coffee.

milestones.title: 365 Days Strong
milestones.description: Continuing our journey, bringing new flavors and experiences every day of the year.
